title: Gangstar Vegas v2.2.0d [Mod]
description:
WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS
v Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighter in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE
v Make your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action
v Build up a gangster squad to take over Vegas and win mafia wars

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN
v Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game
v Perform amazing stunts with ragdoll effects making use of HAVOK PHYSICS
v Climb the leaderboards in tough CHALLENGES including air, water and street racing, MMA fighting & more!
v Become Vegas's finest shooter in Carnage & Heist modes
v Break the bank in addictive CASINO GAMES

A RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE
v Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, flamethrowers & an electric guitar!
v Drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars & fighter jets
v UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS & GEAR and customize their appearance
v Enjoy an amazing soundtrack featuring Skrillex, Kavinsky, Chromatics and more

Game storyline:
In this third-person shooter action game, you will play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous crime lord Frank VelianoÃ¢Â€â„¢s perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a place where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tightly and take part in the wildest mafia wars ever!

â€¢WEAPONS: Blast your enemies with the powerful Cornucopia, or give them a dressing down with the Desiccated Destruction!
â€¢CLOTHES: Cool ceremonial clothing fit for an exorcism: Pilgrim Set, Witch Hat and Jack-oÃ¢Â€â„¢-Lantern Grimace.
